Pope Leo XIV leads Pentecost Mass, Regina Caeli prayer

caption.rendered: VATICAN CITY (Vatican City State (Holy See)), 08/06/2025.- A handout photo made available by the Vatican Media shows Pope Leo XIV leads the Holy Mass on the Solemnity of Pentecost on the occasion of the Jubilee of Ecclesial Movements, Associations and New Communities, in Vatican City, 08 June 2025. (Papa) EFE/EPA/VATICAN MEDIA HANDOUT HANDOUT EDITORIAL USE ONLY/NO SALES
